title: Tan-Andal vs. Andal (G.R. No. 196359)
ratio: Psychological incapacity is not a medical illness but a legal ground. It must be proven as a durable part of a person's personality which renders them incapable of complying with essential marital obligations.
subject: Civil Law

title: Chi Ming Tsoi vs. CA (G.R. No. 119192)
ratio: The senseless and prolonged refusal of one person to indulge in sexual intercourse with their spouse should be considered psychological incapacity.
subject: Civil Law
